article_title: Israel says it plans Gaza 'humanitarian islands'
sentence: The  Israeli  military  launched  a  campaign  in  Gaza  after  Hamas  gunmen  killed  about  1,200  people  in  southern  Israel  on  7  October  and  took  253  other  people  hostage.

article_title: Israel says it plans Gaza 'humanitarian islands'
sentence: Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  more  than  31,300  people  have  been  killed  in  the  territory  since  then.
